name: Little Green Girl
description:
A fascinating visual novel in a Russian setting!

The life of the protagonist, Roma Belov, is turned upside down when he meets a mysterious girl who turns out to be a real alien! The game features three unique stories:

- Yana's story will tell you about a secret collaboration between Earth and an alien civilisation. And, of course, that all alien species are submissive to love.

- Stasya's story is filled with the spirit of adventure and adventurism. You will be able to build a relationship with the beautiful young athlete! Or maybe cooperate with a secret alien control organization?

- Kristina's story will tell you about the background behind the charming class monitor' emerald eyes.

Episode 1 is available! It takes you through the first six days of the game.
Further episodes are in development!

Features (first episode):
- A compelling story from the writer of the "Buns, Kefir and Rock and Roll" mod (the highest-rated Endless Summer mod of all time, over 100,000 subscribers on Steam), balancing humour, drama, adventure and light fanservice;
- 150 colourful illustrations from the artist of games such as "Wet steps", "Moe Era" and "Herbalist";
- Over a hundred music tracks, including original compositions by Leety and Pazetic Ocean;
- More than 15 hours of unhurried reading;
